about_the_game:
Jaime was just playing in the forest when, drawn in by a beautiful red bird, he accidentally fell into a deep and mysterious cave. Now, he must find a way to escape while uncovering the forgotten secrets of this ancient place. In an underground world full of dangers and lost stories, you embark on an exciting adventure, solving puzzles, exploring hidden passages, and helping spirits that long for liberation.

In the past, this cave was the home of a tribe that worshipped the god Guaracy, creator of light and protector of nature. They lived in harmony until foreign invaders arrived and destroyed the sacred tree that channeled sunlight into the depths of the caverns. The magical Ybá fruit, the last remnant of that ancient power, now glows in the depths, waiting to be collected. Use the power of the sacred necklace given by the bird to create blocks of light, scaling impossible heights, revealing hidden paths, and overcoming obstacles.

With each step, you uncover pieces of this ancient puzzle. Help the spirits, solve complex challenges, and recover lost tools like Jaime’s hoe to clear the corrupted roots blocking your progress. Immerse yourself in a captivating narrative that blends legends, mystery, and perseverance as you uncover the truth about the tribe’s fate and fight your way back to the surface.

With an immersive atmosphere, a unique soundtrack, and creative exploration mechanics, this game promises an unforgettable adventure. Explore, solve, collect, and climb as you guide Jaime on his journey home and help restore peace to the souls trapped in the depths. Are you ready to uncover the mysteries of the cave and set the spirits free?
